con:config.script:
def list = [] new File( "D:\\Users\\sonken\\My Documents\\WSDLBruteForce.txt" ).eachLine { line -> list.add( line ) }
log.info( "Read " + list.size() + " test values.." )
context.setProperty( "values", list ) context.setProperty( "index", 0 )
log.info( "values = " + context.getProperty("values").size()) log.info( "index = " + context.getProperty("index"))
